mapper.select: /* listAllItem 아이템 조회*/ SELECT item_oid , user_oid , contents , status , delete_yn , input_date_time , mod_date_time , del_date_time FROM item WHERE 1=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY input_date_time DESC ) RNUM , item_oid , user_oid , contents , status , delete_yn , input_date_time , mod_date_time , del_date_time FROM item WHERE 1=1
) X WHERE RNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY input_date_time DESC ) RNUM , item_oid , user_oid , contents , status , delete_yn , input_date_time , mod_date_time , del_date_time FROM item WHERE 1=1
AND del_date_time IS NULL ) X WHERE RNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( item_oid, user_oid, contents, status, delete_yn, input_date_time, mod_date_time, del_date_time ) VALUES ( #{itemOid}, #{userOid}, #{contents}, #{status}, #{deleteYn}, #{inputDateTime}, #{modDateTime} , #{delDateTime} )
